name: darkest-lariat
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.
